QuestData.Title: Tenderpaw By Name, Tender Paw By Reputation
QuestData.Description: I'd like to go tell Xiao, Kang, and the others that I've found the hidden master, but now he won't let me leave! He says I have to pass that test of bamboo first.$b$b<Lin whispers:> How'd you do that, by the way?$b$bIt looks like, for the time being, I'm stuck here practicing my punches against this rock. And my knuckles are about to cave in.$b$bIf you could gather some jademoon leaves, I could prepare an ointment and at least numb some of this pain.
QuestData.RewardText: <Lin pauses for a moment to rub the leaves on her swollen paws.>$b$bThank you! I can prepare a proper ointment later, but this will do for now.
